data.title: CosmoGRaPH: Cosmological General Relativity and (Perfect fluid | Particle) Hydrodynamics
data.name: cosmograph
data.description: COSMOlogical General Relativity And (Perfect fluid | Particle) Hydrodynamics

evidence: “Cosmological General Relativity And (Perfect fluid | Particle) Hydrodynamics Code” – domain-specific simulation code, indicating an application used to run cosmological simulations.

“The generated executable should accept a single configuration file as a parameter… in order to run a 'test' simulation of a pure-dust universe” – users run an executable to perform simulations, i.e., application software directly used for research.
“1) Clone the code: `git clone https://github.com/cwru-pat/cosmograph`” – distribution is via cloning the source repository and building from source.
